newsitem.title: USA: Full House comments on Iacocca stake.
newsitem.headline: Full House comments on Iacocca stake.

text.p: Full House Resorts Inc said Tuesday that Lee Iacocca has transferred his 1,056,471 shares in the company, representing a 10.2 percent stake, to LKL Family Limited Partnership.

The general partner of this partnership is a corporation solely owned by Iacocca, who is the former chairman of Chrysler Corp. Iacocca also owns individually all of the limited partnership interests of the partnership.
Full House said it issued the statement on Iacocca's shares in response to reports that he has sold or no longer owns shares in the company.
Full House develops destination resorts and entertainment, gaming and commercial centers.
